skins.name: Camellya
skins.description: Red is passionate and wild; white is serene and pure. Camellya dances at the junction of two opposing forces.

73.name: Somewhere No One Travelled
73.description:
Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Everblooming</color> increases Camellya's Crit. DMG by {0} for {1}s. This effect can be triggered once every {2}s.
Immune to interruptions while casting <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color>.

74.name: Calling Upon the Silent Rose
74.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color> is increased by {0}.

75.name: A Bud Adorned by Thorns
75.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Fervor Efflorescent</color> is increased by {0}. When in <color=Highlight><te href=850021>Budding Mode</te></color>, Camellya's ATK is increased by {1}.

76.name: Roots Set Deep In Eternity
76.description: Casting <color=Highlight>Everblooming</color> gives all team members {0} Basic Attack DMG Bonus for {1}s.

77.name: Infinity Held in Your Palm
77.description: The DMG Multipliers of Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Everblooming</color> is increased by {0} and Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Twining</color> is increased by {1}.

78.name: Bloom For You Thousand Times Over
78.description:
The DMG Multiplier of Forte Circuit's <color=Highlight>Sweet Dream</color> is additionally increased by {0}. 
Forte Circuit <color=Highlight>Perennial</color>: Within {1}s after casting <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color>, if Concerto Energy is full and <color=Highlight>Perennial</color> is not on cooldown, Resonance Skill is replaced with <color=Highlight>Perennial</color>.
Casting <color=Highlight>Perennial</color> consumes {2} Concerto Energy and recovers {3} Crimson Pistils, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> equal to {4} of <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color> DMG, considered Basic Attack DMG. This skill can be cast once every {5}s.
Camellya enters <color=Highlight><te href=850021>Budding Mode</te></color> after casting <color=Highlight>Perennial</color> and removes all Crimson Buds. The bonus DMG Multiplier granted by Forte Circuit's <color=Highlight>Sweet Dream</color> is increased to {6}.
Immune to interruptions when casting <color=Highlight>Perennial</color>.

params.name: Burgeoning
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
After performing <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color> or Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Pruning</color>, hold <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> to continuously strike the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> is automatically followed by <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 5</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Pruning</color></size>
Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> right after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.

params.name: Valse of Bloom and Blight
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Crimson Blossom</color></size>
Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> (considered Basic Attack DMG), then enter <color=Highlight>Blossom Mode</color>.
This attack can be performed in mid-air.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Blossom Mode</color></size>
- Unable to move while suspended on vines.
- <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> and Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Pruning</color> are replaced by Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz</color>: chain together 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
- When performing <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz Stage 3</color>, hold <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Blazing Waltz</color> that deals <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> before automatically performing <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz Stage 4</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is replaced by Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Atonement</color>. Tap <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> right after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
- Resonance Skill is replaced by Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color>. Casting <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color> deals <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
- Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color> can be cast in mid-air.
- <color=Highlight>Blossom Mode</color> ends after casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Blossom Mode</color> ends after using the <color=Highlight>Levitator</color>.
- Jump is replaced with Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Ronde</color>. Use Jump to attack the target at the cost of STA, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> (considered Basic Attack DMG). This ends the <color=Highlight>Blossom Mode</color>.
- Using Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz</color> and Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Blazing Waltz</color> in mid-air consumes STA.
- Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color> doesn't restore STA.
- Consume STA continuously to stay suspended on the vines.

9700038.name: STA Cost Per Second When Suspended

params.name: Fervor Efflorescent
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
This attack can be performed in mid-air.

params.name: Seedbed
params.description: Gain {0} Havoc DMG Bonus. DMG dealt by Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Pruning</color> is now considered Basic Attack DMG.

params.name: Epiphyte
params.description: Gain {0} Basic DMG Bonus. Gain increased resistance to interruption when casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz</color>, and Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Blazing Waltz</color>.

params.name: Vegetative Universe
params.description:
Hitting a target with <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Blazing Waltz</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Ronde</color>, Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Atonement </color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Crimson Blossom</color>, and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color> consumes Crimson Pistils. The Energy Regen Multiplier of this attack is increased by {0}.
Consuming {1} Crimson Pistils recovers {2} Concerto Energy and obtains <SapTag=3>{3}</SapTag> Crimson Bud(s). Each bud lasts for {4}s, stacking up to {5} times.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Forte Circuit: Ephemeral</color></size>
When Concerto Energy is fully recovered, and <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color> is not on Cooldown, Resonance Skill is replaced with <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color>.
Casting <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color> consumes {6} Concerto Energy and deals <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> to the targets. This damage is considered Basic Attack DMG.
Camellya enters <color=Highlight>Budding Mode</color> after casting <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color>.
This can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Budding Mode</color></size>
- <color=Highlight>Sweet Dream</color>: Increase the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Blazing Waltz</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Ronde</color>, Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Atonement</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Crimson Blossom</color>, and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color> by {8}.
- Casting <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color> consumes all Crimson Buds. Each Crimson Bud consumed additionally increases the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Sweet Dream</color> by {9}, up to {10}. 
- When in <color=Highlight>Budding Mode</color>, Camellya cannot gain Crimson Buds.
- When in <color=Highlight>Budding Mode</color>, the Energy Regen Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Waltz</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Blazing Waltz</color>, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Vining Ronde</color>, Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Atonement</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Crimson Blossom</color>, and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Floral Ravage</color> is reduced to {11}.
- <color=Highlight>Budding Mode</color> ends when Camellya is switched off the field.
- <color=Highlight>Budding Mode</color> ends when all Crimson Pistils are consumed.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Crimson Pistil</color></size>
Camellya can hold up to {12} Crimson Pistils.
- Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Everblooming</color> recovers {13} Crimson Pistils.
- Activating Forte Circuit's <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color> recovers {17} Crimson Pistils.

params.name: Twining
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> equal to {0} of Camellya's ATK.
After activating Forte Circuit's <color=Highlight>Ephemeral</color>, the next Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Twining</color> deals additional <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> equal to {1} of Camellya's ATK.

params.name: Tune Break: Sword
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
